mapper.insert: insert into user(user_email, user_password, user_nickname, user_intro) values("${userEmail}" ,"${userPassword}" , "${userNickname}", "${userIntro}");
mapper.select: select count(*) from user where user_nickname="${nickname}";
select count(*) from user where user_email="${email}";
select count(*) from user where user_email="${userEmail}" and user_password="${userPassword}";
mapper.update: update user set user_password="${tempPassword}" where user_email="${userEmail}";
mapper.select: select distinct problem_id from ps_submit where user_id="${userId}" and submit_status="맞았습니다." order by problem_id;
select distinct problem_id from ps_submit where user_id="${userId}" and submit_status!="맞았습니다." order by problem_id;
